1  Grandma’s Ultimate Double-Chocolate Chip Cookies  
2  
3  Ingredients:  
4  - 2 cups unbleached all-purpose flour  
5  - 1 tsp aluminum-free baking soda  
6  - ¾ tsp fine sea salt  
7  - 1 cup unsalted European butter, softened  
8  - ½ cup granulated sugar  
9  - 1 cup packed dark brown sugar  
10 - 2 large free-range eggs  
11 - 1 Tbsp pure vanilla extract  
12 - 2 cups bittersweet chocolate chunks  
13  
14 Directions:  
15 1. Preheat oven to 175 °C (350 °F) and line baking sheets.  
16 2. Whisk flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.  
17 3. Cream butter with both sugars until pale.  
18 4. Add eggs one by one, then vanilla, scraping the bowl.  
19 5. Fold in dry mix, then chocolate chunks; chill dough 30 min.  
20 6. Bake for 10–13 min until edges are golden.
